TEXT.TITLE: UNITED <UAL> TO BEGIN BURBANK-DENVER ROUTE
TEXT.BODY: UAL Inc's United Airlines said it will offer scheduled service between Burbank, Calif., and Denver, Colo., starting June five. United said it will operate two daily round-trip flights in the Burbank to Denver market using new Boeing Co <BA> 737-300 aircraft. United said as a promotion for its new route it will offer a bonus of double mileage to all members of its frequent flyer prgram, Mileage Plus, who fly the Burbank-Denver route during the first 45 days of service. Reuter
